abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Betentacled Maw is 8.

abilities.name: Mutant Regeneration
abilities.description: This unnatural abomination is invigorated by the raw power of Chaos.

abilities.name: Aura of Mutation
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.description: To stand near a Mutalith can have horrific consequences.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect below. If this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Tzeentch Wizard, you can roll 2 dice instead, pick either result, then apply the corresponding effect below.

1 Untouched: No effect.
2 Hideous Disfigurement: Subtract 3 from the target's control score until the start of your next turn.
3 Troggbrains: The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.
4 Gift of Mutations: Subtract 1" from the target's Move characteristic for the rest of the battle.
5 Horrific Absorption: Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target. Then, Heal (D6) this unit.
6 Transmogrification: Pick any other effect.
